title: Alimens & Gentle Mens Dress Shirts 4-Way Stretch Long Sleeve Collared Casual Solid Wedding Dating Button Down Shirt
description: Stretch fabric: this shirt's stretch fabrics have good elasticity and comfortable to wear, provides a snug fit and flexibility to you
Classic design: include a variety of classic design elements such as: pocket, adjustable cuff, soft, spread collar, button down closure
Regular fit: fits true to size and regular fit, if you're unsure of what size to purchase, refer to the size chart and match it to your usual clothing size
Multiple occasion: it's a perfect choice for your daily casual wear, business, dates, formal, shopping, party, outdoor activities, and any other occasions in spring, summer, fall and winter
Easy care: machine washable or handwash in cold water, wrinkle less, low iron if necessary
